Company: NORCOM-North East King County Regional Public Safety Communication Agency
Description of incident: The North East King County Regional Public Safety Communication Agency (NORCOM) has announced a security breach of a server that stored records of an estimated 6,000 medical responses for Duvall Fire District 45, Skykomish Fire Department and Snoqualmie Pass Fire & Rescue. Currently, the investigation has revealed that the medical response records breached included names, addresses, dates of birth, nature of emergency call and initial medical condition. The breach also included personnel data for 231 full-time and volunteer firefighters who work or have worked for the three agencies. This information could include drivers license informatin, date of birth, Social Security numbers, emergency contact and limited medical information.
